value:
My, what a variety of Heroes! I never
expected to clap eyes on so many
realmsworth of adorable creatures...

I'm told some don't appreciate male
dancers, but I do my best to support
everyone all the same.

I lost my mother, and sometimes, I
wonder if she'd smile if she saw me
as I am now, carrying on her legacy.

At the performing arts festival, my
friends put on plays, they sang, they
danced...$k$pWhy don't we do something like that
here? A wonderful idea, wouldn't you
say?

When I'm dancing is the only time I
don't need to remind myself to smile.
It just happens naturally.

I've moseyed over here to bring you
$Nf's best.$k$pMy outfit? It's for dancing, of course!
Isn't it something?

I've danced so much for you... I
have that to thank for this.

My dream came true—I'm a
dancer. Now the real work starts!

How embarrassing! And it means
more practice, too...

With this power, I'll dance even
more beautifully. Just watch me!

I am Inigo. I've long dreamed of being
a dancer, and I'll dance my heart out
on this stage you've provided me.

I have to thank you for calling me to
this world and letting me dance for
so many Heroes.$k$pI've been to a lot of places, seen a lot
of things, and met a lot of people...
Many of them are dear to me now.$k$pBut none of them—not a single one—
was able to see me as I am now.
Nobody saw my dream made real.$k$pBut now, thanks to you, my dream IS
real. Nothing could make me happier.$k$pIt's not so easy to say this, and maybe
it's not easy to hear it, either... Your
support means a lot. I'm in your debt.$k$pI hope to stay by your side for a long
time to come. I want to help you reach
your dream. I want to see you smile.$k$pNow, and forever...my heart brims
with affection for you.
せいっ！
Here I go!
わあっ！
C-c'mon...
This'll make you smile!
One more dance? Sure.
Watch these moves!
Grand finale!
Wrong step.
Heehee
Dazzling, yes?
A dance, just for you!
Does this outfit suit me? I had it made for the festival.
Are you trying to catch me rehearsing my steps? I...I need to practice alone.
Think this outfit will make the ladies swoon? Ha! I'd stake my life on it.
With this sort of presence, I'll be sure to put a smile on each and every face.
I'll show you, and only you, a special dance of mine. I put a lot of sweat and tears into this one. I hope you like it.
OK.
Let's dance.
Time for tea?
Someone call for a dancer to cheer the mood? I guess I'll do!
